GETTING CEPH

git clone git://github.com/ceph/ceph.git

INSTALL CEPH DEPLOY

The ceph-deploy tool enables you to set up and tear down Ceph clusters for development, testing and proof-of-concept projects. To install ceph-deploy with apt, execute the following: 

sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install ceph-deploy
#sudo yum install ceph-deploy

CEPH INSTALLATION

  1. Add keypublic

wget -q -O- 'https://download.ceph.com/keys/release.asc' | sudo apt-key add -

  1. Add ceph repo to apt source
  2. Update /etc/hosts file with name resolutions

echo deb http://ceph.com/debian-firefiy/$(lsb_release -sc)main |sudo tee /etc/apt/source.list.d/ceph.list

  1. Make sure you can login to all the ceph hosts passwordless
  2. Create a ceph-cluster folder and movw to that folder
  3. Install ceph-deploy
  4. Make ceph hosts ready for the ceph installation
  5. Add below configuiration in ceph.conf generated
  6. Install all ceph components on all the ceph hosts
  7. Make sure you find the below files in the directory
  8. Deploy initial monitor for ceph
  9. Make sure after completion below files are to be present
  10. Format all the drives for OSD
  11. Prepare OSD
  12. Activate the OSDs
